channel.title: PVP Servers
channel.description: Well, I'm currently programming a server for RSW, and I'm wondering what people look for in a PVP server. Can be anything, just list a bunch of stuff you would like to see in a pvp server.

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:17, topic:379411”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=475258.msg3486232#msg3486232 date=1296597777]
All players able to spawn.
Overpowered items.
Donators get special items that kill everyone.
Admins that abuse.
Mods that abuse.
No banks.
100% Lag all the time.
10% up time.

Perfect server.

[/quote]

Have you ever actually posted something that wasn’t meaningless?

OT: I’m currently working on a PvP server myself. Only advice I can give you is to fix up your combat and normally if anyone donates in a PvP server they automatically own the wilderness… I’d like to see one thats like, clan based. Not just 1v1 and having donators rule.

EDIT: Curses are really OP in my opinion… I dont think you should add those if you were thinking about it. Every server i login to now has them, and they generally all suck.[/quote]

How is that meaningless? He is telling me what not to do.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“why so serious, post:9, topic:379411”]I own a pvp server with 40-75 daily

and they like:
Claws
Yell/message
Vesta (pvp armors)
Chaotic

They want:
dark bow
Hand cannon

Hopefully i gave you some good idea’s.
PM me i can get you tutorials/models/public void if you need.[/quote]

LMFAO, and I am blakeman1392 in disguise

Don’t underestimate me as a programmer, I rarely to never use tutorials unless I need an idea.

Thanks for suggestions though.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @drunk_mario drunk mario
item.description:
@drunk_mario wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar X, post:6, topic:379411”]• You should be able to spawn everything except discontinued items and gold. Gold should be a drop from kills, which in return would buy discontinued items.[/quote] Spawning on a PVP server = fail server. (spawning for normal players on any server=failure)

I look for good specs, not too high but like ags special should be anywhere from 0-about 70. D claws cant be overpowered and well… good weapons in general like ags,d claws, dharoks…etc.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar X, post:6, topic:379411”]• Stability. I won’t bother playing an unstable server.
• You should be able to spawn everything except discontinued items and gold. Gold should be a drop from kills, which in return would buy discontinued items.
• Combat must be realistic and well coded.
• Staff must be respectful and mature.[/quote]
No, because I don’t like to log on a server with full bandos and dclaws.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

• Stability. I won’t bother playing an unstable server.
• You should be able to spawn everything except discontinued items and gold. Gold should be a drop from kills, which in return would buy discontinued items.
• Combat must be realistic and well coded.
• Staff must be respectful and mature.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Thanks for the advice guys.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Also, a server where the noobs get a chance against the higher levels, because I’ve seen a lot of servers with uber Bandos players who fight only the new guys with rune armour. Maybe you could make it so you don’t lose drops once you start off and after 5 or so kills/deaths, it starts making you lose items? Also no matter how weird it sounds, I like PvP servers with minigames and skilling. Don’t focus too much on them, but if you have woodcutting, mining, runecrafting, smithing and fletching I’ll be happy.

One last point, after you have everything economical in order, start balancing out melee with ranged and magic following the combat triangle where (melee > magic > range > melee) because if melee is just the best with ags, dds, dragon claws and such weapons then people will be disinclined to even train any other skills and at some point you will start losing players because everyone will have achieved bandos, ags and dclaws status and they will get bored of your server.

Read full topic

item.title: PVP Servers
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

The only way a PVP server will work is it is supported economically. Things cant cost to little nor too high. Everything needs to be balanced.

Read full topic
